methods.name: getReply
methods.doc: Retrieves a Reply object based on lookup by id

methods.name: initReply
methods.doc: ONLY CALLED BY ReviewService. Creates a new Reply object with given attributes, and stores it into the databases

methods.name: editReply
methods.doc: Retrieves a Reply by ID, and modifies its attributes according to editRply's arguments before re-storing. Review it is attached to cannot be modified.

methods.name: deleteReply
methods.doc: ONLY CALLED BY ReviewService. Deletes a Reply, permanently.
